DOC.brief_summary: Study assess potential different property telmisartan , due Vd , result strong `` beneficial '' effect AT1 blockade tissue ( e.g . aldosterone suppression renin increase ) plus strong AT2 stimulation compare candesartan
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Potential Different Properties Telmisartan Compared Candesartan Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males , age 18 45 year . 2 . Absence relevant disease determine clinically deviation normal medical history , clinical laboratory determination , ECGs physical examination 3 . Systolic blood pressure ( SBP ) 100 140 mmHg systolic 85 mmHg diastolic ( left right arm ) heart rate ≥50 bpm 4 . Signed informed consent form 5 . No intake drug inbetween wait time ten time halflife 1 . Contraindications Ang II antagonist , know hypersensitivity , history angioedema , serious allergy , asthma , allergic skin rash , significant allergic rhinitis sensitivity drug 2 . History cardiovascular disease : clinically significant cardiovascular disease , supine diastolic blood pressure > 86 mmHg systolic > 141 mmHg measure standard sphygmomanometer heart rate ≤49 bpm 3 . Cerebrovascular disease : history stroke transitory ischemic attack ( TIAs ) history cerebral bleeding 4 . Renal disease : serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL 5 . Gastrointestinal/Hepatic disease : Aspartate aminotransferase ( ASAT ) > 40 U/l Alanine aminotransferase ( ALAT ) > 40 U/L , serum bilirubin > 2x upper limit normal , history malabsorption inability tolerate oral medication , history gastric duodenal ulcer , history significant gastrointestinal bleeding , history hepatitis within past year 6 . Any history alcohol drug abuse 7 . Use follow drug within 4 week study enrolment ( e.g . agent know induce drug metabolize enzyme ) : anabolic steroid corticoid , antiarrhythmic ( amiodarone , mexiletine , quinidine , propafenone ) , antibiotic ( chloramphenicol , tetracycline , sulfonamide , macrolides , cephalosporin , rifampicin , nalidixic acid ) , antiepileptic ( phenytoin , carbamazepine ) , antifungal ( e.g . griseofulvin ) , barbiturates , cimetidine , ethacrynic acid , fibrates , furosemide , haloperidol , lipid lower agent ( cholestyramine , hydroxymethylglutaryl , coenzyme A ( HMG CoA ) reductase inhibitor , dextrothyroxin ) , thyroid replacement therapy hormone thyrostatics ( thioureylenetype ) . The use nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) discontinue 2 week prior study enrolment , one exception aspirin one ( 1 ) week prior study enrolment 8 . Participation investigational study , within 30 day prior enrolment 9 . Blood donation within previous 3 month 10 . The investigator might disqualify subject sound medical psychiatric reason
